Home.DepartmentName: The platform of the Registrar's Department of Tashkent State Technical University named after Islam Karimov
Home.Departmenttext: Academic activities and registrar's department provides the main services of the university to students from one place quickly, efficiently and transparently.
Home.ViewApplicationText: Through this service, you can enter your phone number and application number and receive information about the status of your application submitted to the Registrar's Department.
